c:complexType.name: SlidingWindow

c:property.name: length
c:property.c:documentation:
The domain length to show on the sliding window axis.
When unspecified, the sliding window is considered disabled.

c:property.name: dimension
c:property.c:documentation:
The name of the dimension associated with the sliding window.
Default When unspecified, the sliding window will be associated with the dimension of the base axis.

c:property.name: select
c:property.c:documentation:
A function that, given a dataset, selects the data to be removed.
Default The default function uses the length specified in , to remove every datum which is not in the domain window.
If the dimension specified in is not numerical or Date, no datum is removed.
